for adding and removing bundlers, and proposing, finalizing, and canceling bundles.","kind":"dev","methods":{"addBundler(address)":{"details":"Only callable by the contract owner. Bundlers are added by protocol governance.","params":{"_bundler":"The address to grant bundler permissions to."}},"assertionDisputedCallback(bytes32)":{"params":{"assertionId":"the identifier of the disputed assertion."}},"assertionResolvedCallback(bytes32,bool)":{"details":"This is not implemented by the inherited Optimistic Proposer, but we want it here.","params":{"assertedTruthfully":"Whether the assertion was resolved as truthful or not.","assertionId":"The identifier of the assertion that was resolved."}},"cancelBundle(uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by an approved bundler.They may cancel a bundle if they make an error, to propose a new bundle.","params":{"_bundleTimestamp":"The proposal timestamp of the bundle to cancel."}},"constructor":{"params":{"_bondAmount":"Amount of collateral currency to make assertions for proposed transactions","_bundler":"Address of the initial bundler for the Bookkeeper contract.","_collateral":"Address of the ERC20 collateral used for bonds.","_finder":"UMA Finder contract address.","_identifier":"The approved identifier to be used with the contract, compatible with Optimistic Oracle V3.","_liveness":"The period, in seconds, in which a proposal can be disputed.","_rules":"Reference to the Oya global rules."}},"deleteProposalOnUpgrade(bytes32)":{"details":"In case of an Optimistic Oracle V3 upgrade, the proposal execution would be blocked as its related assertionId would not be recognized by the new Optimistic Oracle V3. This function allows the proposal to be deleted if detecting an Optimistic Oracle V3 upgrade so that transactions can be re-proposed if needed.","params":{"proposalHash":"the hash of the proposal to delete."}},"getCurrentTime()":{"details":"This only exists so it can be overridden for testing."},"getProposalBond()":{"returns":{"_0":"The amount of bond required to propose a transaction."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"proposeBundle(string)":{"details":"Only callable by an approved bundler.This function will call the optimistic oracle for bundle verification.","params":{"_bundleData":"A reference to the offchain bundle data being proposed."}},"proposeTransactions((address,uint8,uint256,bytes)[],bytes)":{"details":"Proposer must grant the contract collateral allowance at least to the bondAmount or result of getMinimumBond from the Optimistic Oracle V3, whichever is greater.","params":{"explanation":"Auxillary information that can be referenced to validate the proposal.","transactions":"the transactions being proposed."}},"removeBundler(address)":{"details":"Only callable by the contract owner. Bundlers are removed by protocol governance.","params":{"_bundler":"The address to revoke bundler permissions from."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setCollateralAndBond(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_bondAmount":"amount of the bond token that will need to be paid for future proposals.","_collateral":"token that will be used for all bonds for the contract."}},"setEscalationManager(address)":{"details":"Only the owner can call this method. The provided address must conform to the Escalation Manager interface. FullPolicyEscalationManager can be used, but within the context of this contract it should be used only for whitelisting of proposers and disputers since Oya module is deleting disputed proposals.","params":{"_escalationManager":"address of the Escalation Manager, can be zero to disable this functionality."}},"setIdentifier(bytes32)":{"params":{"_identifier":"identifier to set."}},"setLiveness(uint64)":{"params":{"_liveness":"liveness to set in seconds."}},"setRules(string)":{"params":{"_rules":"string that outlines or references the location where the rules can be found."}},"setUp(bytes)":{"params":{"initializeParams":"ABI encoded parameters to initialize the module with."}},"sync()":{"details":"If a new Optimistic Oracle V3 is added and this is run between a proposal's introduction and execution, the proposal will become unexecutable."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."}},"title":"BundleTracker","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"addBundler(address)":{"notice":"Adds a new bundler."},"assertionDisputedCallback(bytes32)":{"notice":"Callback to automatically delete a proposal that was disputed."},"assertionResolvedCallback(bytes32,bool)":{"notice":"Callback function that is called by Optimistic Oracle V3 when an assertion is resolved."},"assertions(bytes32)":{"notice":"Mapping of oracle assertion IDs to bundle timestamps."},"bundlers(address)":{"notice":"Addresses of approved bundlers."},"bundles(uint256)":{"notice":"Mapping of proposal block timestamps to strings pointing to the bundle data."},"cancelBundle(uint256)":{"notice":"Cancels a proposed bundle."},"constructor":{"notice":"Construct Oya BundleTracker contract."},"deleteProposalOnUpgrade(bytes32)":{"notice":"Function to delete a proposal on an Optimistic Oracle V3 upgrade."},"getCurrentTime()":{"notice":"Gets the current time for this contract."},"getProposalBond()":{"notice":"Getter function to check required collateral currency approval."},"lastFinalizedBundle()":{"notice":"The proposal timestamp of the most recently finalized bundle."},"proposeBundle(string)":{"notice":"Proposes a new bundle of transactions."},"proposeTransactions((address,uint8,uint256,bytes)[],bytes)":{"notice":"Makes a new proposal for transactions to be executed with an explanation argument."},"removeBundler(address)":{"notice":"Removes a bundler."},"setCollateralAndBond(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the collateral and bond amount for proposals."},"setEscalationManager(address)":{"notice":"Sets the Escalation Manager for future proposals."},"setIdentifier(bytes32)":{"notice":"Sets the identifier for future proposals."},"setLiveness(uint64)":{"notice":"Sets the liveness for future proposals. This is the amount of delay before a proposal is approved by default."},"setRules(string)":{"notice":"Sets the rules that will be used to evaluate future proposals."},"setUp(bytes)":{"notice":"Sets up the Oya BundleTracker contract."},"sync()":{"notice":"This caches the most up-to-date Optimistic Oracle addBundler(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner. Bundlers are added by protocol governance.

params._bundler: The address to grant bundler permissions to.

params.assertionId: the identifier of the disputed assertion.

assertionResolvedCallback(bytes32,bool).details: This is not implemented by the inherited Optimistic Proposer, but we want it here.

params.assertedTruthfully: Whether the assertion was resolved as truthful or not.
params.assertionId: The identifier of the assertion that was resolved.

cancelBundle(uint256).details: Only callable by an approved bundler.They may cancel a bundle if they make an error, to propose a new bundle.

params._bundleTimestamp: The proposal timestamp of the bundle to cancel.

params._bondAmount: Amount of collateral currency to make assertions for proposed transactions
params._bundler: Address of the initial bundler for the Bookkeeper contract.
params._collateral: Address of the ERC20 collateral used for bonds.
params._identifier: The approved identifier to be used with the contract, compatible with Optimistic Oracle V3.
params._liveness: The period, in seconds, in which a proposal can be disputed.
params._rules: Reference to the Oya global rules.

deleteProposalOnUpgrade(bytes32).details: In case of an Optimistic Oracle V3 upgrade, the proposal execution would be blocked as its related assertionId would not be recognized by the new Optimistic Oracle V3. This function allows the proposal to be deleted if detecting an Optimistic Oracle V3 upgrade so that transactions can be re-proposed if needed.

params.proposalHash: the hash of the proposal to delete.

getCurrentTime().details: This only exists so it can be overridden for testing.

returns._0: The amount of bond required to propose a transaction.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proposeBundle(string).details: Only callable by an approved bundler.This function will call the optimistic oracle for bundle verification.

params._bundleData: A reference to the offchain bundle data being proposed.

proposeTransactions((address,uint8,uint2.details: Proposer must grant the contract collateral allowance at least to the bondAmount or result of getMinimumBond from the Optimistic Oracle V3, whichever is greater.

params.explanation: Auxillary information that can be referenced to validate the proposal.

removeBundler(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner. Bundlers are removed by protocol governance.

params._bundler: The address to revoke bundler permissions from.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._bondAmount: amount of the bond token that will need to be paid for future proposals.
params._collateral: token that will be used for all bonds for the contract.

setEscalationManager(address).details: Only the owner can call this method. The provided address must conform to the Escalation Manager interface. FullPolicyEscalationManager can be used, but within the context of this contract it should be used only for whitelisting of proposers and disputers since Oya module is deleting disputed proposals.

params._escalationManager: address of the Escalation Manager, can be zero to disable this functionality.

params._rules: string that outlines or references the location where the rules can be found.

params.initializeParams: ABI encoded parameters to initialize the module with.

sync().details: If a new Optimistic Oracle V3 is added and this is run between a proposal's introduction and execution, the proposal will become unexecutable.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

assertionDisputedCallback(bytes32).notice: Callback to automatically delete a proposal that was disputed.

assertionResolvedCallback(bytes32,bool).notice: Callback function that is called by Optimistic Oracle V3 when an assertion is resolved.

assertions(bytes32).notice: Mapping of oracle assertion IDs to bundle timestamps.

bundles(uint256).notice: Mapping of proposal block timestamps to strings pointing to the bundle data.

deleteProposalOnUpgrade(bytes32).notice: Function to delete a proposal on an Optimistic Oracle V3 upgrade.

getCurrentTime().notice: Gets the current time for this contract.

getProposalBond().notice: Getter function to check required collateral currency approval.

lastFinalizedBundle().notice: The proposal timestamp of the most recently finalized bundle.

proposeBundle(string).notice: Proposes a new bundle of transactions.

proposeTransactions((address,uint8,uint2.notice: Makes a new proposal for transactions to be executed with an explanation argument.

setCollateralAndBond(address,uint256).notice: Sets the collateral and bond amount for proposals.

setEscalationManager(address).notice: Sets the Escalation Manager for future proposals.

setIdentifier(bytes32).notice: Sets the identifier for future proposals.

setLiveness(uint64).notice: Sets the liveness for future proposals. This is the amount of delay before a proposal is approved by default.

setRules(string).notice: Sets the rules that will be used to evaluate future proposals.

setUp(bytes).notice: Sets up the Oya BundleTracker contract.

sync().notice: This caches the most up-to-date Optimistic Oracle V3.
